info.name: Ecosia - Dark theme 2020
info.description: Ecosia dark theme - verified and working 2020 A dark theme for the Ecosia search engine & services. Uses lightweight CSS to ensure a seamless dark theme experience. Compatibility: • Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera • Works with Ecosia mobile-mode • Tested on 'Stylish' and 'Stylus' extensions Currently works with the following Ecosia sites: • www.ecosia.org • info.ecosia.org • blog.ecosia.org If you find any issues while using this theme, please report the issue and we will fix it as soon as possible. Development Team: • FocusOnTheSun - Search engine dark theme • Freaky Lord - Information site, blogs & consultancy
info.additionalInfo: Thanks to user 'Freaky Lord' for developing these updates with me! Latest version (Updated 02/10/2020): v4.0 - Major Release - Fixes all existing issues found from extensive testing & a complete re-write of the code-base for better future-proofing, compatibility & speed Update history: v3.7 - Styling to financial reports & other information page fixes + small search engine fixes v3.6 - Add fancy style to sign-in page + add styling to main results callouts v3.53 - Fix settings page styling + burger menu (finally!) + fix main results dropdown v3.52 - Fix settings page header + fix inconsistent scrollbar colour v3.51 - Settings page minor fixes + banner dark style + footer border colour fix + more v3.5 - Fix styling issues from recent updates + re-format settings page v3.41 - Fix coronavirus widget when 'Coronavirus' is searched v3.4 - Fix chrome styling issues + search bar shadows v3.33 - Fix new Chromium MS Edge Beta search bar styling issue v3.32 - Change search bar color + update fixes v3.31 - Dark theme logo for Ecosia blog! v3.3 - Fix latest Ecosia update changes + theme look & feel improvements v3.2 - Update buttons, popups, search bar and more to look subtly nicer! v3.11 - Fix small styling errors with search engine theme v3.1 - Added dark theme for blog - credit to 'Freaky Lord'! v3.02 - Fix share buttons footer + filters button + nav styling v3.01 - Fix initial Ecosia pop-ups + info page styling + minor fixes & styling changes v3.0 - Dark theme for information site added + minor changes v2.23 - Settings page + notifications updates v2.22 - Homepage fixes & more future proofing v2.21 - Fix tree counter + menu updates v2.2 - 10th Anniversary update & homepage improvements v2.1 - Future proofing & option to enable advertisements v2.0 - Mobile mode, logo update, pagination, forms, ad-block & more v1.0 - Initial release
